fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
All legislations concerning commercial road transport (buses, coaches, trucks and taxis). 
Futur planned proposals and legislations originating from the EU institutions and its Members states. 
Recent issues include: social legislation measures in Members states, Weight & Dimensions legislation for commercial road vehicules, future EC road package.
organisation_name: International Road Transport Union Permanent Delegation to the EU (IRU)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: BILLIET#Marc Pol, DINIS#Maria, GIRO#Carlo, KAMBERSKI#Oleg, KERN#Daniel, LEBEDA#Remi, MARIAN#Raluca, MEYER#Claire, Maedge#Matthias, SMITH#Acacia, VISSER# Esther

goals__remit: The IRU Permanent Delegation to the EU was established in 1973 as an independent body, with its own statutes, in Brussels, Belgium.  It's mission is to support IRU EU Member Associations in monitoring and ensuring informed legislation on all issues dealt with by the EU institutions that affect road transport.
